# MPNowPlayingInfoMediaType.video

**Case**

The now playing media item is a video item.

## Declaration

```swift
case video
```

## Media types

- **MPNowPlayingInfoMediaType.none**: There is no now playing media item.
- **MPNowPlayingInfoMediaType.audio**: The now playing media item is an audio item.

items.description: There is no now playing media item.
items.name: MPNowPlayingInfoMediaType.none

items.description: The now playing media item is an audio item.
items.name: MPNowPlayingInfoMediaType.audio

title: MPNowPlayingInfoMediaType.video
